content:
# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 0.0, 0.0)
- Status: No ingredients, Fuel: 13

### Furnace at position (2, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 2.0, 0.0)
- Status: No ingredients, Fuel: 6

### Furnace at position (2, 2)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 2.0, 2.0)
- Status: No ingredients, Fuel: 20

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to furnaces having no ingredients
- Ensure that you have the necessary ingredients to keep the furnaces operational. Check your inventory and supply lines to ensure they are adequately stocked.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the desired location.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.
